subject: Welcome to KO Assets!
message: Welcome to the new KO Assets platform. We're excited to have you here! This system provides powerful asset management capabilities including collections, rights management, and advanced search. Explore the features and let us know if you have any questions.

subject: Monthty Updates
message: We've added many improvements and some new content. Check out http://localhost:8787/help/updates/2025-october . We'd love to hear your feedback!
